post0.content: The FAVAR model is represented by the following system: . $$ X_t = Lambda^f F_t + Lambda^y Y_t + e_t $$$$ begin{bmatrix} F_t Y_t end{bmatrix} = Psi(L) begin{bmatrix} F_{t-1} Y_{t-1} end{bmatrix} + v_t $$where $F_t$ is the collection of variables that is unobservable, while $Y_t$ is is of the observable. For further description of the FAVAR model and its properties please see BBE (QJE, 2005) .
